The family favorite Pintxo place in Barcelona. Also the most friendly (least intimidating). They also have a small dining room that is quite pricey, would stick with the pintxos (tapas served on a piece of bread Basque-style, The host/hostess offers you plates as soon as you walk in, then grab whatever you want (but hold on to the toothpicks as this is what they use to total your bill.  As others have explained, would wait for the hot tapas to come out of the kitchen, although the cold pintxos are good as well. Standing room only.
